dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Hello! I'm Indy. Nice to meet you!

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Hello! I'm oo. Nice to meet you too!

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Thank you for coming here today! So, I need your help with something… Can you help me?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Of course! What can I help you with?

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Actually, I have to set the table by 10 minutes. So firstly, can you take 4 placemats?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes, but I don't know where they are.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Oops, I forgot to tell you where they are. They are on the top of the kitchen counter.

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: I got it.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Thank you. Can you place them now?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Good. Next, can you take 4 plates? They are probably on the shelf.

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Thank you! Where do you think the plates should be placed?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: I think I should place them on the centre of each placemat.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Good idea! Can you place one dinner plate for each person?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Next, I want you to arrange cutleries. We will have roast chicken and salad for dinner, which cutleries do you think we need?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: I think we need 4 forks and 4 knives.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Right! Then, can you take and arrange them?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: So next, can you take 4 glasses on the top of the kitchen counter?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Good. Where do you think the glasses should go?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: I think I should put them on the top-left of each placemat.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Sounds great! Can you put them?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Then, can you take 4 napkins in the drawer?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: I want you to put them on each plate, but before you do that, could you fold them nicely?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: Yes.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: After folding them, can you put them?

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: I'm sure.

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: Excellent! Thank you for helping me!

dialogue11.speaker: user
dialogue11.utterance: You're welcome!

dialogue11.speaker: robot
dialogue11.utterance: See you soon!

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: By the way, don't you think this room is messy?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: Right? Can you help me tidy up?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: First, could you wipe up the spilled water on the table and clean it up?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: Thanks. Next, could you put the scattered stuffed animals into that box over there?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: By the way, do you like Pokémon?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: Really! I love Pokémon too. My favourite is Ditto.

dialogue21.speaker: Learner
dialogue21.utterance: Ditto is cute. I'm done tidying up.

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: Thanks. Now, there are empty water bottles in the kitchen. Could you throw them away in the trash?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: Do you have any favourite drinks?

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: That sounds delicious! I only consume electricity, so I can't taste it, though.

dialogue21.speaker: Robot
dialogue21.utterance: Thanks! Finally, there are pencils and erasers in that drawer over there, but they're all mixed up. Could you sort them out, putting the pencils on the left and the erasers on the right?

dialogue21.speaker: Learner
dialogue21.utterance: Thanks! The room looks much cleaner now!

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: Hi, oo!

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Hi!

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: I can't seem to find something. Could you help me look for it?

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Yeah, what are you looking for?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: I'm looking for my phone charger. I put it in the bottom drawer, but I can't find it anywhere.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Okay, can you describe the charger in more detail? What does it look like?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: It's white and has a Pokémon sticker on it.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Got it.

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: Do you often lose things?

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: No, not really. I'm usually pretty good at keeping track of my belongings.

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: That's good to hear. I tend to misplace things all the time.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Hey, is this it?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: Oh my gosh, yes! Thank you so much for finding it! Now, I'm looking for my black ballpoint pen.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: No problem. Do you have any idea where you might have left it?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: I think I used it last at the dining table, so it should be somewhere around there. Could you check for me?

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Sure, Let me take a look.

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: I'm so sorry, I lose things so easily. I don't know how I manage to misplace them all the time.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: It's okay, everyone does it sometimes. Is this it?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: Yes, that's it! Thank you so much!

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: You're welcome.

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: Actually, there's one more thing. I'm looking for my white and blue vase.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Okay, where do you think you might have left it last?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: I washed it with the dishes and then put it away, so I think it's probably in the kitchen cupboard.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: Let me take a look.

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: Thank you.

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: There are two vases, one blue and one white. Which one are you looking for?

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: I was looking for the white one! Thank you!

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: You're welcome.

dialogue31.speaker: Robot
dialogue31.utterance: See you soon!

dialogue31.speaker: Learner
dialogue31.utterance: See you!
